name: The Open Source Spatial Electrification Tool
description: OnSSET is an open source, GIS-based tool for developing electrification investment scenarios towards achieving universal access to electricity in accordance with SDG7.

SDGs.evidenceText: OnSSET focuses on SDG7, particularly target 7.1 which is to "ensure universal access to affordable, reliable and modern energy services". The tool identifies the least-cost technology (grid-extension, mini-grid or stand-alone technologies) to meet the electricity demand in each settlement in a country or region.

organizations.name: KTH Royal Institute of Technology - division of Energy Systems
